misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face from Kurk Golf, brings a unique perspective to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Marcus has been a constant presence at the tournament since its inception, participating in all 11 editions thus far. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering.

Off the course, Marcus is known to be quite introspective, battling with his sense of identity. On occasion, he has been known to compete as "Eva", a talented female golfer with a remarkably similar playing style. Regardless of which persona graces the fairway, the dedication to the sport is undeniable. Marcus is anticipated to compete in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, marking his 12th appearance.
